posts.post_content:
Posted By: Josh C.
Very much would like to get a couple of of the Piedmont Series 350-460 Factory 42's.  Preferably graded, but as long as you can vouch for the card(s) authenticity and freedom from alterations I would take those too.


I also would rather lower grade cards that have decent or better eye appeal- I'm not in the market for high grade copies of these.



HOF'ers obviously are always nice but even lower tier guys I would like to buy or trade for.







The best would be 

McGraw (either pose)

Chance

Crawford

Evers

Jennings 

Joss

Lajoie

Willis

Marquard

Mathewson 

I have some pretty good stuff like an Evers T206 Cubs PSA 3, and a few other goodies.)




Please email me if you have any available with- if at all possible- a clear scan or pic of front and back and a price and/or trade value.


joshr90@gmail.com


Thank you!




-Josh

Posted By: Josh C.
Just a little bump.  Still looking to pick up a couple of these.




-Josh
